wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Dunlop of Dunlop (1806 – 3 April 1839) was a British Army officer and politician.

response: *John Dunlop of Dunlop (1806–1839), British Member of Parliament for Kilmarnock Burghs
*John Dunlop (chess player) (1886–?), New Zealand chess champion
*John Dunlop (Unionist politician) (1910–1996), former MP for Mid Ulster
*Bellefonte Forge House, Pennsylvania, also known as the John Dunlop House
